<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:id="@+id/main"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <!-- Wrap everything in a ScrollView -->
    <androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent">

        <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content">

            <!-- Button for Android 1.5 Cupcake -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_cupcake"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Cupcake (1.5)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_donut"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

            <!-- Button for Android 1.6 Donut -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_donut"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Donut (1.6)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_eclair"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_cupcake" />

            <!-- Button for Android 2.0 Eclair -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_eclair"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Eclair (2.0)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_froYo"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_donut" />

            <!-- Button for Android 2.2 FroYo -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_froYo"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="FroYo (2.2)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_gingerbread"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_eclair" />

            <!-- Button for Android 2.3 Gingerbread -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_gingerbread"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Gingerbread (2.3)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_honeycomb"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_froYo" />

            <!-- Button for Android 3.0 Honeycomb -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_honeycomb"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Honeycomb (3.0)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_ics"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_gingerbread" />

            <!-- Button for Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_ics"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Ice Cream Sandwich (4.0)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_jellybean"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_honeycomb" />

            <!-- Button for Android 4.1 Jellybean -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_jellybean"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Jellybean (4.1)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_kitkat"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_ics" />

            <!-- Button for Android 4.4 KitKat -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_kitkat"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="KitKat (4.4)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_lollipop"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_jellybean" />

            <!-- Button for Android 5.0 Lollipop -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_lollipop"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Lollipop (5.0)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_marshmallow"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_kitkat" />

            <!-- Button for Android 6.0 Marshmallow -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_marshmallow"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Marshmallow (6.0)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_nougat"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_lollipop" />

            <!-- Button for Android 7.0 Nougat -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_nougat"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Nougat (7.0)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_oreo"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_marshmallow" />

            <!-- Button for Android 8.0 Oreo -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_oreo"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Oreo (8.0)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_pie"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_nougat" />

            <!-- Button for Android 9.0 Pie -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_pie"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Pie (9.0)"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_android10"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_oreo" />

            <!-- Button for Android 10 -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_android10"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Android 10"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_android11"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_pie" />

            <!-- Button for Android 11 -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_android11"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Android 11"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_android12"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_android10" />

            <!-- Button for Android 12 -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_android12"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Android 12"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_android13"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_android11" />

            <!-- Button for Android 13 -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_android13"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Android 13"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/button_android14"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_android12" />

            <!-- Button for Android 14 -->
            <Button
                android:id="@+id/button_android14"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Android 14"
                app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
                app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_android13" />

        </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
    </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

<!-- res/layout/custom_toast.xml -->
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:orientation="horizontal"
    android:padding="10dp"
    android:background="@drawable/toast_background"
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content">

<ImageView
android:id="@+id/toast_image"
android:layout_width="40dp"
android:layout_height="40dp"
android:layout_marginEnd="10dp" />

<TextView
android:id="@+id/toast_message"
android:layout_width="wrap_content"
android:layout_height="wrap_content"
android:text="Message"
android:textSize="16sp"
android:textColor="#FFFFFF" />
</LinearLayout>
